abstract: The start-up could be to networking what VMWare was to computer servers, a company that comes out of nowhere and with clever software sharply drops the price a hardware maker can get for a server.
snippet: The start-up could be to networking what VMWare was to computer servers, a company that comes out of nowhere and with clever software sharply drops the price a hardware maker can get for a server.
lead_paragraph: With $40 million in funding, an all-star bench of investors and engineers, and technology that has already drawn spies, Nicira is an unusually visible company in the supposedly secretive "stealth" stage of its early life.
